ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11559 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.169"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11309)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11310)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10278), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.16 DYNAMIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] methodCode (CONF:10277), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:11127)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:11128)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice such that it (CONF:11129)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11311), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.19 DYNAMIC (CONF:11312)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.04
contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="DEV"
contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11309)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11310)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10278), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.16 DYNAMIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] methodCode (CONF:10277), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:11127)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:11128)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice such that it (CONF:11129)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11311), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.19 DYNAMIC (CONF:11312)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.04
contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="DEV"
contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.169"/> <code code="67519-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> <methodCode/> <participant typeCode="WIT"> <participantRole> <playingDevice> <code/> </playingDevice> </participantRole> </participant> </observation>
